posts.post_content:
I was hoping for more than your perusal, therefore the thread name change.:D

A pair of cards and now another pair

Byrne SOLD

Scott SOLD

Weimer SOLD

Greminger SL SOLD

These cards are every bit as good as they look in case you missed them.

If you nibble, I may wiggle.:eek::eek::eek:

Frank,

I don't want to low-ball you, but if you'll accept $26.99 or Byrne, I'll take him :).

PM to follow.

Scott
Frank, I will low ball you at $25 for the Scott. Or you can keep it.:D

[quote name="bnorth" post=1342652]Frank, I will low ball you at $25 for the Scott. Or you can keep it.:D[/QUOTE]

I'll have to see if I get a lower offer, Ben.:eek::D

PM sent.
Can we agree you dont want to sell at market price?

[quote name="Peter_Spaeth" post=1342678]Can we agree you dont want to sell at market price?[/QUOTE]

Thanks for your interest in my Weimer.  If you are unclear concerning the market price, I suggest you visit the deli.
I'd rather not look at your Weimer, esp if you now slashed it. Are you a masochist?

Frank, I'd like to buy the Weimer from you if you accept Paypal (and if it's still available). I think I've gone about as long as I can without buying a T206 card. Plus, I've not done business with you before, and I'd like to remedy that. :)

Frank, I copied and pasted my last PM sent at 10:52, which included the Paypal transaction # and my address. Please let me know if you didn't get it. Also, make sure your inbox isn't full.

Thanks.

Edit: Frank, I got my card in today. This card is a real beauty in person. Thank you for the great transaction!
